170131.title: Kyrgyzstan
170131.extract: increased morality and preservation of the gene pool
a positive attitude toward non-traditional sexual relations.

In this era of independence, it is not surprising that there has been a return to spiritual roots not only in Kyrgyzstan, but also in other post-communist republics. It would be immoral to develop a market-based society without an ethical dimension.
not a bad thing in itself. It keeps our society more moral, cleaner.
